1: Walc'ual, chixoc il che u tatabexic ri pixbenic ri cuya' ri i tat chiwe; kas chitatabej ri cubij chiwe, rech quirik utzalaj chomanic.
2: Nu yo'm jun utzalaj tijonic chiwe, jeri' chi ma ta mixoc il chque tak ri e nu tijonic.
3: In xukuje' in uxinak alc'ualaxel: sibalaj nim ri nu lok'al chuwäch ri nu nan,
4: ri nu tat je nu pixbexic wa' xubano: “Chebatz'ibaj pa ri a chomabal ri e nu tzij; chanimaj ri takanic ri quinya' chawe, catc'asi' c'u na.
5: Charika' ri no'j xukuje' utzalaj chomanic; mebasach ri nu tzij.
6: Lok' chawila' wi ri no'j maya' apan jela' cuya' c'u na ri u to'banic chawe.
7: Chuwäch apachique jun jasach chic charika' ri no'j xukuje' utzalaj chomanic.
8: Chalok'ok'ej cunimarisaj c'u na a k'ij: chalak'apuj, nim c'u catril wi na;
9: ¡cusipaj na jun je'lalaj wikbal a jolom are' c'u a corona wa' cucoj chajolom!”
10: Chebatatabej tak ri e nu tzij, nu c'ojol, chabana' awech chque, catcasi' c'u na q'ui junab.
11: Ri in catinc'am na bic pa ri be re ri no'j: quinban na chawe chi catbin pa ri utzalaj be,
12: chupam ri utzalaj be man e c'o ta k'atibal cärik na, pune' ta ne catxiq'uinic man cachak'ij ta na awib.
13: Co chachapa' awib che ri tijonic matzokopij c'ut; chabana' jas ri cubij, c'aslemal c'u wa' chawe.
14: Matbe pa ri qui be ri e banal tak etzelal. Matakej u banic awe ri itzel qui c'aslemal.
15: Chak'ila' awib che ri awoc'owic pa ri qui be; chatasa' awib chquij, chatakej at ri a be,
16: man c'u quec'oji' ta pa jamaril we man caquiban ri lawaloyil; caquitzak ri qui waram we man caquibano chi c'o jachin cäkaj pa qui k'ab.
17: ¡Ri qui wa xukuje' ri cuq'uia' are ri u banic ri etzelal xukuje' ri tokinic!
18: Ri qui be ri suc'alaj tak winak junam ruc' ri u sakaribal jun c'ac' k'ij: ri cäbe u q'uiyic c'ä cäjuluw na pa ronojel ri u juluwem.
19: Are' c'u ri qui be ri banal tak etzelal xa k'ekumalil; ¡Mawi ne queta'm jas ruc' cäquipak'ij wi quib!
20: Chatoc il chque ri nu tzij, nu c'ojol; chebaya' a xiquin che qui tatabexic.
21: Mawi jubik' mebel chawäch, ¡chebatz'ibaj pa ri a chomabal!
22: E are' queyo'w c'aslemal xukuje' rutzil wächaj che ronojel ri cärikowic.
23: Chachajij ri a chomabal chuwäch apachique jasach ri c'o cho ri uwächulew, che c'ut caq'uiy wi ri c'aslemal.
24: Chak'ila' awib che qui bixic jastak ri xa quesubunic; chanajtajisaj awib che u banic banoj tzij.
25: Amak'el chawäch chatca'y wi apanok, chatca'y amak'el chawäch.
26: Kas chawila' na jawije' quebe a ya' wi ri awakan, amak'el c'ut catac'alej na cowilaj ulew.
27: Majuluch'ij ri a be; chak'ila' awib che qui ya'ic ri itzel tak u xo'l awakan.
